LanguageData.JRWEdmontosaurus.label: Edmontosaurus
LanguageData.JRWEdmontosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0883-1940 [EDMONTOSAURUS REGALIS] CODENAME: CAMO >382
A striped hadrosaurid with a bellowing call. They are heavyset, more so than other hadrosaurs, and use this to their advantage in combat.
LanguageData.JRWEdmontosaurus.tools.head.label: head
